description: No need to spend weeks learning Excel. Look like a pro in the shortest time possible with 12 skill packed videos. This Crash Course in Microsoft Excel 2013 teaches 15 Essential Excel skills recognized by business users and managers world-wide plus additional bonus Excel Power User Skills, including keyboard shortcuts, pivot tables and formatting techniques to give you a professional edge. Add Excel skills to your resume to impress at interviews and satisfy employment requirements or use your new skills to increase office productivity and the way you analyze data. This is a Knowledge Content Course - Created and produced by Richard Bailey of Client by Design.
title: Excel 2013 Essentials Crash Course
